Reviews.Title: Westinghouse Wall mount
Reviews.Author: Debra Brown
Reviews.Content: This has been a very good purchase that has helped me to mount my TV to the wall and be able to have the best viewing angle.  Thanks for this item.  Before this I had my TV on a dresser and now I have more space to have some electronics in that space instead of having the TV taking up that space.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING! Definately recommend
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: I love the picture quality and all its features. Best tv i have had so far. I recieved it damaged at first which is why I only gave it four Stars but thanks to the retailers who sold it to me I was able to get another tv (same make and model) and see how wonderfully it works. It has 2 hdmi ports, surround sound, etc. I would definitely recommend this tv to anyone and everyone.

Reviews.Title: Very Good. Only 1 small issue
Reviews.Author: Dj Duncan
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent TV. I've had it for a couple years now and I haven't had any issues until recently. It will turn off on me randomly and I'll have to struggle with turning it back on because it'll shut off continuously (3-5 times in a row). After the short battle, it stays on until I shut it off. This doesn't really interfere with the viewing quality, just an annoyance that I'm looking into. If anyone knows what the issue is and has a solution, feel free to let me know. I figure its the power supply as the TV seems to cut all power to it and struggle to stay on. Overall, excellent TV for the price.

ProductInfo.Features:

Features a slim 1.0-inch edge profile thanks to the all-LED backlit LCD display.
